job_description:
The Board of the Institute of Organic Chemistry and Biochemistry of the Czech Academy of Sciences is seeking applications for the position of Director of the Institute.

The successful candidate will lead the institute and promote its further development according to the highest scientific standards.

The staff at IOCB Prague comprises over 900 employees across 48 research groups and core facilities. IOCB Prague has an annual budget of approximately 65 million USD and is a state-of-the-art research institution located in a newly renovated campus.

The long-term goal of IOCB Prague is excellence and the highest scientific standards of basic research in chemical biology and biochemistry, medicinal chemistry, organic chemistry, and computational/physical chemistry with a strong connection to applications, primarily via its daughter company IOCB Tech.

More information, including the current concept of scientific development at IOCB Prague in the period from 2021 to 2025, is available on the IOCB Prague website.

Requirements 

PhD or equivalent doctoral degree in the area of chemistry, biology, or medicine; senior level scientific experience; proven management skills 

Dates

  • Deadline for applications: February 28, 2022, 3pm CET 
  • On-site interviews or videoconferences with preselected candidates: April 7, 2022 from 10am CET 
  • Expected start date: June 1, 2022 (for a term of five years with possible re-election for another five-year term) 

Full information

For more details about the position, necessary qualifications and other requirements, application submission, and contacts, please visit www.uochb.cz/en/director2022.
